content: crochet some cute **christmas lights amigurumi** to decorate your christmas tree use one as a festive keychain for the holidays as a gift tag or as a little gift for family and friends string a few together to make some colorful garlands for your tree or home decor *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 2 75-mm c/2 usa 12 uk crochet hook dk 3 medium weight yarn one stitch marker to work in the round safety eyes 5 mm poly-fil or cotton stuffing tapestry needle **yarn** i used **paintbox yarns cotton dk** 137 yds 125 m per 50 g in the following colors pink bubbl pink 451 or color of choice green grass green 430 black pure black 402 feel free to use any yarn with the appropriate hook **size** 2 4 6 cm long by 1 4 3 5 cm at the largest point **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
